sentences.en: "Medicare" is available to victims of advanced kidney disease.
sentences.cn: 老年医疗保险也适用于肾病晚期患者。

sentences.en: About 80 percent of the graduates advanced to senior high schools.
sentences.cn: 约有80%的毕业生升入了高中.

sentences.en: advanced learners of English
sentences.cn: 高级程度的英语学习者

sentences.en: advanced physics
sentences.cn: 高等物理（学）

sentences.en: advanced technology
sentences.cn: 先进的技术

sentences.en: advanced weapon systems
sentences.cn: 先进的武器系统

sentences.en: As I advanced towards the dog, It'snarled and struck at me.
sentences.cn: 我朝那条狗走去时, 它狂吠着向我扑来.

sentences.en: He was suffering from cancer which had already reached an advanced stage.
sentences.cn: 他的癌症已经到晚期了.

sentences.en: high levels of unemployment in the advanced industrial societies
sentences.cn: 发达工业社会中的高失业率

sentences.en: His ideas are advanced, and only a few people could understand him.
sentences.cn: 他的思想是先进的, 只有少数人能理解他.

sentences.en: Research is also advanced by frequent conference to exchange experience.
sentences.cn: 经常开会交流经验也促进了研究工作的发展.

sentences.en: She advanced a step or two and glared hate at the enemy.
sentences.cn: 她向前走了一两步,以仇恨的目光瞪着敌人.

sentences.en: Tech-nology has advanced at a breathless pace.
sentences.cn: 技术进步速度惊人，日新月异。

sentences.en: The bank advanced $1.2 billion to help the country with debt repayments.
sentences.cn: 银行预支12亿美元帮助该国偿还债务。

sentences.en: The bustle and din gradually faded to silence as night advanced.
sentences.cn: 随着夜越来越深,喧闹声逐渐沉寂.

sentences.en: The gentleman, despite his advanced years, helped Kathryn back to her seat.
sentences.cn: 这位绅士，尽管年事已高，仍然帮着凯瑟琳回到座位上。

sentences.en: The lab has recently been updated to allow for more advanced courses.
sentences.cn: 实验室最近经过更新，可以上更高阶的课程了。

sentences.en: The rebels have advanced to within 150 kms of the capital.
sentences.cn: 叛军已经逼近到距首都150公里的地方。

sentences.en: The ski school coaches beginners, intermediates, and advanced skiers.
sentences.cn: 滑雪学校训练指导初学者及中级与高级滑雪者。

sentences.en: There were only three of us on the advanced course.
sentences.cn: 只有我们三人学高级课程。

words.tran_cn: 前进者；相位超前补偿器，进相机
提出；预付；使……前进；将……提前
前进；增加；上涨（advance的过去式和过去分词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 先进经济体系；发达的经济
n. （英国）一般学历证书考试优等（等于A level）

trans.tran_cn: 先进的，高级的，后期的，年迈的
前进；增加；上涨（advance的过去式和过去分词形式）
